Took way too long to download, (was never getting above 10 Mb/s) so I got it from my friend who already downloaded it. Few things:

Intro is is Russian, no problem though, it's not very important

Runs very well with slightly lowered settings (turned down resolution) on white unibody MacBook (2.26 GHz, 4 GB RAM, NVIDIA GeForce 9400M Graphics Card)

Sound has a .5-1.5 second lag, depending on what's happening. Don't know why.

Game does crash when exiting to menu from Single Player.

LAN works, I was able to create a game through the console and my friend's game automatically detected it and it appeared at the bottom of the main menu. Game crashed when I exited to main menu from LAN game, just for me though, not for my friend.

Instructions on how to create LAN game:

On main menu, press ` (under esc, above tab) to open console.
Type "sv_allow_lobby_connect_only 1" and press enter.
Type "sv_lan 1" and press enter.
If you want a difficulty other than Normal, type "z_difficulty [Easy, Normal, Advanced, Impossible]" and press enter.
Type "map " and scroll down to the one you want (They are in order). Press enter.
The map will load.
Your friend, on the main menu will see a server pop up on the botton of his screen. They should click it, and then select "Join." Works perfectly.
